name: UpdateMergeField
description:
Update a specific merge field in a list.

This tool updates a specific merge field for a given list in Mailchimp. Use it when you need to modify the properties of a merge field, such as its name or type, within a specific list.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the list to update the merge field in.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: merge_field_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the specific merge field to be updated.

value_schema.description: The id for the merge field.

parameters.name: merge_field_update_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details of the merge field to update. Include properties like tag, name, required, default_value, public, display_order, options, and help_text.

tag.description: The merge tag used for Mailchimp campaigns and [adding contact information](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/merge-fields/#add-merge-data-to-contacts).

name.description: The name of the merge field (audience field).

required.description: Whether the merge field is required to import a contact.

default_value.description: The default value for the merge field if `null`.

public.description: Whether the merge field is displayed on the signup form.

display_order.description: The order that the merge field displays on the list signup form.

default_country.description: In an address field, the default country code if none supplied.

phone_format.description: In a phone field, the phone number type: US or International.

date_format.description: In a date or birthday field, the format of the date.

choices.description: In a radio or dropdown non-group field, the available options for members to pick from.

options.description: Extra options for some merge field types.

help_text.description: Extra text to help the subscriber fill out the form.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the list.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: merge_id
parameters.description: The id for the merge field.

value_schema.description: The id for the merge field.

default_value.description: The default value for the merge field if `null`.

display_order.description: The order that the merge field displays on the list signup form.

default_country.description: In an address field, the default country code if none supplied.

phone_format.description: In a phone field, the phone number type: US or International.

date_format.description: In a date or birthday field, the format of the date.

choices.description: In a radio or dropdown non-group field, the available options for members to pick from.

options.description: Extra options for some merge field types.

help_text.description: Extra text to help the subscriber fill out the form.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
